[event]
# Urn
type=event
location=10,15,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/il_chest_common.txt
loot_count=1
mapmod=object,10,15,269
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/inventory/inventory_object.ogg
tooltip=Urn

[event]
# Crate
type=event
location=15,12,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/il_chest_common.txt
loot_count=1
mapmod=object,15,12,286
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Crate

[event]
# Spawn antlions
type=event
location=8,10,10,8
activate=on_trigger
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/enemies/antlion_hit.ogg,12,14
spawn=il_antlion_small,9,12;il_antlion,12,16;il_antlion_small,16,16;il_antlion_small,15,10;il_antlion,11,10;il_antlion,12,13;
spawn_level=hero_level,1

[event]
# Water dripping
type=event
location=14,12,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/cave_droplets_loop.ogg
